You ain't seen nothin' yet. When Halliburton begins reconstruction management in that area, serious looting will take place.

There's a bell shaped curve for every trait in every group of people. You'll find bad cops in every city...and they're not all black.
 
 The news media LOVES to report the bad stuff...hence we see it every day!
 
 Many of the NO Police have left their jobs...overcome by the situation, or they're searching for their own families. At least two rescue workers have committed suicide. I expect astounding stories of mental collapse and ethics collapse will occur for months to come. The Mayor of NO expects there will be 10,000 or more deaths in NO from this catastrophe.

You ain't seen nothin' yet. When Halliburton begins reconstruction management in that area, serious looting will take place.

 
 That's a thought. Hey, if we can keep Halliburton busy in NO, then maybe we could end this Iraq thingy. After all, if they have Louisiana, who needs Iraq?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Even the cops are looting...
